verses.name: Numbers 7:59
verses.text: And for a sacrifice of peace offerings, two oxen, five rams, five he goats, five lambs of the first year: this was the offering of Gamaliel the son of Pedahzur.

verses.name: Numbers 7:60
verses.text: On the ninth day Abidan the son of Gideoni, prince of the children of Benjamin, offered:

verses.name: Numbers 7:61
verses.text: His offering was one silver charger, the weight whereof was an hundred and thirty shekels, one silver bowl of seventy shekels, after the shekel of the sanctuary; both of them full of fine flour mingled with oil for a meat offering:

verses.name: Numbers 7:62
verses.text: One golden spoon of ten shekels, full of incense:
